mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
update dish
category_id = #{categoryId},
description =#{description},
image = #{image},
name = #{name},
price = #{price},
status =#{status},
update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user = #{updateUser}
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from dish where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select * from dish where id = #{id} limit 1
